Address.label: Address
Address.value: 3001 QUAIL SPRINGS PARKWAY, OKLAHOMA CITY, Oklahoma, 73134, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Gulfport Energy Corp is an independent exploration and development company. The company operates through Utica Shale and Scoop properties. The Utica Shale is located in the Appalachian Basin of the United States and Canada. The Scoop (South Central Oklahoma Oil Province) play of Oklahoma is located in the southeast portion of the prolific Anadarko Basin.
